cause.description:
Well everyone knows the giant tennis balls they have for small animals to play with well who wouldnt like to play a game of giant tennis with those...but you cant use a normal sized racket, for that would be far to small. what you would need is a GIANT RACKET. a $699 racket from http://www.sportogo.com/index.asp?PageAction=VIEWCATS&Category=358
1. To play with big tennis balls
2. To play with big tennis rackets
3. To play until Nick sees us in his backyard
cause.mission: To raise $1400 to buy giant tennis rackets and play giant tennis
cause.name: Kyle, Breen, and Michelle's Giant Rackets for Giant Tennis...fund
